comments.body: Thanks this looks great! (and all the other callers of `_dict_to_std_map` below)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +48,52 @@        # Redefinition of `RooCategory` constructor for converting python dict to std::map.
        # The instances in the dict must correspond to the template argument in std::map of the constructor.
        if len(args) > 2 and isinstance(args[2], dict):
            args = list(args)
            args[2] = _dict_to_std_map(args[2], {"std::string": "int"})
